categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: In 138 ABY, during the final stages of the Second Imperial Civil War, a skirmish took place on The Wheel space station. Darth Talon of the One Sith briefly fought the crew of the Mynock, but fled after informing them of a gift she had left aboard the ship—Imperial Knight Antares Draco, frozen in carbonite. Draco had been tortured into revealing the location of the New Jedi Order's Hidden Temple to the Sith, and Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Krayt delivered Draco to Mynock Captain Cade Skywalker so that Krayt's enemies in the Alliance would rush to the Jedi's aid in defending the Temple, thus allowing him to crush them all in one swift stroke with his secret Sith trooper army.
